title: Karamja gloves 4

properties.name: description
properties.value: Karamja gloves 4 are a reward for completing all the Easy, Medium, Hard and Elite tasks in the Karamja Diary. The gloves can be claimed by talking to Pirate Jackie the Fruit found in the Brimhaven, near the entrance to the Brimhaven Agility Arena; she will also replace them if lost. Alternatively, players can purchase a pair from Perdu for 200 coins should they lose them.

Item ID13103

Karamja gloves 4 are a reward for completing all the Easy, Medium, Hard and Elite tasks in the Karamja Diary. The gloves can be claimed by talking to Pirate Jackie the Fruit found in the Brimhaven, near the entrance to the Brimhaven Agility Arena; she will also replace them if lost. Alternatively, players can purchase a pair from Perdu for 200 coins should they lose them.

 Attack bonuses
+1+1+1+1+1
 Defence bonuses
+1+1+1+1+1
 Other bonusesSlot
+1+0+0%+0List

Contents

  • 1 Benefits
    • 1.1 From Karamja gloves 1, 2 and 3
    • 1.2 Karamja gloves 4 only
  • 2 Changes
    • 2.1 Gallery (historical)

Benefits[edit | edit source]

From Karamja gloves 1, 2 and 3[edit | edit source]

When worn
  • 10% extra Agility experience from obstacles in the Brimhaven Agility Arena
  • 10% extra Agility experience from all Agility arena tickets cashed in
  • Discounted prices within Mor Ul Rek
  • Pressure pads in the Brimhaven Agility Arena take 4 ticks to complete rather than 5 ticks.
  • Discounted prices at Karamja General Store and Jiminua's Jungle Store.
At all times
  • Lowers boat trip costs from Port Sarim - Musa Point and Ardougne - Brimhaven from 30 coins to 15 coins
  • Shortcut across Shilo Village river
  • Access to the underground portion of the Shilo Village mine
Operate gloves
  • Free, unlimited teleportation to the underground portion of the Shilo Village mining site

Karamja gloves 4 only[edit | edit source]

  • Free access to Shilo Village furnace
  • Free access to the Hardwood Grove
  • Double tokkul from the TzHaar Fight Cave, Inferno and TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges
  • 10% chance at receiving double tickets in the Brimhaven Agility Arena
  • One fight cave resurrection per day
  • Shortcut to red dragons
  • Noted red dragonhide from Brimhaven Dungeon
  • Metal dragons found in Brimhaven dungeon drop noted bars (right click Bars on Pirate Jackie the Fruit)
Operate gloves
  • Free, unlimited teleportation directly to Duradel

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 March 2019
(update | poll)

The inventory icon of the gloves were graphically updated.

15 March 2018
(update)

The "Activate" option was replaced with "Gem Mine" and "Duradel" options.

24 March 2016
(update | poll)
  • It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
  • The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
8 October 2015
(update)

Tzhaar-Mej is now aware of all four pairs of Karamja gloves.

6 August 2015
(update)

The teleports on the Morytania Legs and Karamja Gloves are now in consistent orders.

21 May 2015
(update | poll)

Karamja gloves 4 can now teleport you directly to Duradel.

12 March 2015
(update)

Karamja gloves 4 now offer all the benefits of Karamja gloves 3.
